welcome_message_body: Welcome to Suffolk, where southern charm meets modern convenience! Explore our historic downtown, enjoy our delicious local cuisine, and take in the natural beauty of our parks and waterways. We're excited to have you here!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lawrence County Airpark Airport, serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Norfolk International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Norfolk International Airport serves primarily domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Newport News/williamsb Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Newport News/williamsb Airport handles all cargo and freight shipments.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
